overview: PULP found fame on the world stage in the 90’s with anthems like ‘Common People’ and ‘Disco 2000’. 25 years later, they return to Sheffield for their last UK concert. Giving a career best performance exclusive to the film, the band share their thoughts on fame, love, mortality & car maintenance.
tagline: PULP found fame on the world stage in the 90’s with anthems like ‘Common People’ and ‘Disco 2000’.
title: Pulp
